mapper.select: SELECT code, member_code, funding_code, price, qty, purchase_state, purchase_date, delivery_code, courier FROM purchase ORDER BY code DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE (code, member_code, funding_code, price, qty, purchase_state, purchase_date, delivery_code, Courier) VALUES (seq_no.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{fundingCode}, #{price}, #{qty}, #{purchaseState}, #{purchaseDate}, #{deliveryNumber}, #{Courier})
